div.p: From the Museo de Historia Natural de Madrid
RB MSS M200b.17, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: MS is a printed certificate with a decorated border.

p.seg: MUSEO de HISTORIA NATURAL de MADRID.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
La Junta facultativa del Museo de Historia natural de Madrid
, con los requisitos y fin prevenidos en el titulo VI. del Reglamento del mismo, en la sesion del dia 30 de Junio del año de 1871 ha nombrado

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Al Señor Don Fernando de Müller, Director del Jardin Botánico de Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MUSEUM OF NATURAL HISTORY OF MADRID

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: The Faculty Board of the Museum of Natural History of Madrid, with formalities and aim accounted for in title VI. of the Regulation of the same, in the session of 30th of June of the year 1871 has nominated as

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p: Don Ferdinand von Müller, Director to the Botanical Garden of Melbourne

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
